name: Hex-A-Colypse
description:
Welcome to Hex-A-Colypse. This game is all about placing cards on a hex board, gather resources from them and defeat enemies.

It's a round based gameplay loop, each round is divided into three phases.

There is a in-game tutorial panel which holds all informations you need to play. 

I would love if you can answer me any of these questions.

  • Does the game run on your pc?
  • Are there any bugs?
  • Did you have fun playing the game?
  • Do you like the gameplay loop?
  • Do you want to beat your own highscore?
  • Would you play this game on your smartphone?

Please let me know what you thing about this small prototype, any feedback which will help to improve this idea is welcome.
